casebody.data:
No. 10-6315. LaVern Berryhill, Petitioner v. Brad Henry, Governor of Oklahoma, et al. 562 U.S. 1027, 131 S. Ct. 572,

178 L. Ed. 2d 412,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8783. November 8, 2010.

Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
